div.a: DATE CHANGE - 1st Annual Waves of Art Event

span.span: The MACS first annual Waves of Art Event will be held VIRTUALLY on Saturday, May 16th, 2020. More information and details to follow shortly. Please check MACS website daily for updates.

POSTPONED - HS Parent Meeting - Keystone Administration

div.span: Maritime Academy Charter School (MACS) provides students in grades 1 through 12 a rigorous academic program with the special theme of maritime studies. MACS students work with the latest technology to learn maritime content such as nautical science and maritime business, while achieving to high standards in English, Mathematics, Science, Social Studies and the Arts.
